alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Leavenworth; Linn; Miami; Wyandotte (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 02 at 8:11AM CST until February 03 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 2 inches through midday in the Kansas City Metro before winding down. Higher snow amounts will occur south and east of the Kansas City area and north of I-70. Additional snowfall expected Wednesday evening through Thursday morning south of Highway 50. An additional 2 to 4 inches of snow is possible along and south of Highway 50 with the snow that moves into the area this evening through Thursday morning. * WHERE...Portions of east central and northeast Kansas and central, north central, northeast, northwest and west central Missouri. * WHEN...Until 6 PM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
